alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Houston; Macon; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Macon, northeastern Dooly, southeastern Peach and Houston Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Unadilla, or 12 miles south of Perry, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Vienna, Unadilla, Byromville, Pinehurst, Lilly, Dooling, Hayneville, Meadowdale, Sand Bed, Houston Lake, Grovania, Elko, Grove Park, Moss Oak, Henderson, Klondike, and Clinchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
